answers.answer: Also I have been staying hydrated and not drinking as many cokes like I was before and I did a lot of physical work around the house yesterday.
I can't even concentrate to finish my thoughts! I'm sorry, I was also going yo say I never experienced cramping when.I had.it with my first son.
You gotta go get checked out... do you have someone that can take you to the Dr? cause you definitely shouldnt drive yourself...

My husband should be home soon, the biggest thing I'm worried about is the cramping because I know what to do to try to tame the preeclampsia I just don't remember ever having cramping with it. Also with the fact I've been having pretty consistent contractions that last any where from 20 minutes to a few hours and they come and go.in intravels then I wont have them at all foe says
*for* days. And I've never carried a baby breech but this one is breeches and has been my entire pregnancy and hasn't changed positions.
I also just realized I haven't felt the baby McEnroe at all today

Well I'm at the Dr and the damn nurses just completely dismissed me. I understand that they get busy but my nurse at my Drs office put in.my chief complaint being no fetal movement and they put me in a room.with a gown and belly band and that's it.

question: I'm 33 weeks and 3 days today and am.having symptoms like preeclampsia. I had it really bad with my first to where I was on bed rest, didn't listen and almost died, anyway I haven't shown any signs of it and I was just at the Dr Friday. Well I'm light headed swollen seeing spots and feel like I'm gonna lass out. On top of that I'm cramping in my lower abdomen. I've been having contractions the past few weeks consistent intervals at random times.
title: Cramping with preeclampsia?
